import React,{useState} from "react"; import Logo from "../Assets/images/logo.png"; import Searchicon from "../Assets/images/icon/search-normal.svg"; import Header1icon from "../Assets/images/icon/maximize.svg"; import Bellicon from "../Assets/images/icon/notification.svg"; import { Button ,Offcanvas} from "react-bootstrap"; export default function Header() { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return ( <>

); }
